page.title: 06Carnival
page.content: The Carnivaal was organised by Accrington Round Table and the Grand Procession began at Thorneyholme Road at twelve o' clock on June 8th and ended at Sandy Lane Playing Fields.Admission for the carnival field is one pound adults and fifty pence for children. Guest stars were Rod Hull and Emu who will be seen at Toy and Model shop Church Street,Accrington,where they will entertain shoppers until 11-30 a.m. Then they will joi the grand procession. The future of Accrington Oak Hill Mansion could soon be decided.Talks have been going on to convert the mansion into self containe flats. Hyndburn Borough Planning Officer Mr David Sutcliffe said this week that negotiations were at an advanced stage.
